alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 207 PM EDT/107 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Greensboro to near Stonemill Creek. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Orange, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Fred George Park, Estiffanulga, Kern, Lowry, Wetumpka, Nixon Garden, Bloxham, Twin Pole, Sawdust and Telogia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
